name: Space Magnet-Chan
description:
Try to collect as many little magnets as you can, but beware the asteroids! 

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: click to move as far as you can within range. 

(range shown by glowing blue circle)

This game was made by Saondberg and AmberFall for ScoreSpace Jam 18.

All art, sounds, and code was created in the 72 hours of the jam. 

Thank you for playing!
